Posts.Content: New confidentiality laws prevent a doctor from discussing a patient's condition with anyone, even a daughter, unless the patient gives written permission.  The doctor cannot talk to you about your mom.  I'd say a surprise visit with your Dad's knowledge might be the best.  It is hard to predict what your mom's prognosis is, but this visit could be your last and it is important for you two to connect while there is still time.
Posts.Title: Mom had breast cancer in remission now spots in liver and lung after 1 month?.

Posts.Content: New confidentiality laws prevent a doctor from discussing a patient's condition with anyone, even a daughter, unless the patient gives written permission.  The doctor cannot talk to you about your mom.  I'd say a surprise visit with your Dad's knowledge might be the best.  It is hard to predict what your mom's prognosis is, but this visit could be your last and it is important for you two to connect while there is still time.
